name: BITE ME, PLEASE
description:
BITE ME, PLEASE is our submission to the Vampire Themed Jam 2021!

"Stuck by their meeting years ago, the vampire hunter approaches the manor... but she doesn't intend to capture anything but the vampire's heart"

  • 1 MC and 1 Love Interest
  • WLW
  • 2 endings
  • 2 CGs

Duration: 15-30min 

A 16+ short, humor-and-horniness-ridden visual novel about capturing the heart of a hot lady vampire! 

DISCLAIMER: Since this is our first VN and our first time participating in a Jam, be patient! We'll upgrade and fix all the tiny mistakes and keep improving after taking a bit of a break ^^

If you wanna support us you can also do it in our Ko-Fi
